title: Watch: Vegans of color unite against the scourge of white veganism for some reason
description:
Leftists have completely destroyed my ability to detect satire. I used to have a finely tuned satirical radar that instantly identified what's a cleverly crafted sketch and what's woke douchelords being woke douchelords. It's been overworked and is currently on the fritz. As God as my witness, I have no idea if this is real or not.

Vegans of color taking a stand against —*deep sigh* — "white" veganism.

\u201cVegans of color unite!\u201d
— Louder with Crowder Dot Com (@Louder with Crowder Dot Com) 1686607668
When you fail to account for white supremacy in veganism, you get white veganism.

We must address the role of white supremacy and the oppression it creates regardless of if we are vegan or not.

White veganism focuses solely on animal liberation while ignoring the context of colonization and imperialism and how all of this affects all human beings and the planet.

There's more, but I felt we could all use a break. Also, rest in peace, Jessica Walter.

Not all white people vegans are "white vegans."

Our veganism must be intersectional, accessible, anti-racist, anti-imperialist, and decolonized.

I have no idea what most of those words mean.

This has to be a comedy troupe. Vegans are an easy target. The lack of eating delicious meat leaves them without the energy to fight back. Plus, no upper body strength. Vegans are known for not having a sense of humor and being easily triggered at all the things. Which, I get it. If I went through life never knowing how orgasmic BBQ is to all five senses, I'd be an insufferable prick too. Keeping all that in mind, I can easily see a handful of improv players pulling this off. You're on TikTok and you don't think vegans are woke enough. Now, GO!

It has to be. The only other alternative is that these are real people trying to make "white veganism" a thing. Because being a vegan isn't obnoxious enough. Let's throw gender studies and critical race theory on top of it! There are people who woke up one morning and chose violence by destroying what's left of satire. It makes me sad.

Then I remember I'm smoking a brisket tomorrow and I feel awesome instead.

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.

title: Massive amount of Americans turn AGAINST allowing trans athletes to compete against real girls: poll
description:
The day after LGBTQI2+ forced Joe Biden to raise their flag on the White House as if they are a conquering country, a new poll shows the Democrat party is on the wrong side of history. A massive amount of Americans have turned against the Biden agenda to force girls to have to compete against boys in sports if those boys say they are girls.

According to Gallup, 69%...

...transgender athletes should only be allowed to compete on sports teams that match the gender they were born with. And in the case of a lot of boys turns girls in high school, the gender they already went through puberty and had a mediocre sports career with. It's 15-point swing from 2021.

Even Democrats went from 55% in 2021 saying boys should compete against girls to now only 47%, while 48% OF DEMOCRATS say it's unfair.

You're free to fill in the blanks as to what you think changed. But for me, it was Lia Thomas. Prior to mediocre swimmer Will Thomas transitioning into NCAA champion Lia, all of these stories were local and scattered. Lia made it national. Now people were saying, "Wait, that girl was a dude, and she...I mean he...I mean...them, are destroying the girls competing? That doesn't seem fair."

Then you saw how EXTREME the pro-trans/anti-girl left had gotten. Lia's teammate Paula Scanlan says she and the other girl were made clear "if you speak up about it, your life will be over in some way, you’ll be blasted all over the internet as a ‘transphobe,’ […] you’ll never be able to get a job."

Opponent Riley Gaines TESTIFIED BEFORE CONGRESS that she, as a student, approached officials, who were grown adults, that she and the other girls didn't think it was right for certain "girls" to be allowed to walk around the girls' lockerroom with their dicks hanging out. She was told it wasn't a girl's locker room anymore and was now Co-Ed. That was the "workaround."

And that's before all the major injuries, like the girl volleyball player who suffered a concussion when a boy who claimed to be a girl spiked the ball in her face.

Normal Americans know all of this is wrong. A small number of radical progressives enjoy seeing boys take opportunities from girls if those boys now claim to be girls. The rub is that small number of radical progressives run the White House and make up a vast majority of media nacademia.

>

<

title: Watch: Keith Olbermann loses last brain cell, wants Trump put to death over classified document  indictment
description:
Anytime Donald Trump is indicted or acquitted of something, there is a cornucopia of leftists overreactions to revel in. Like energon to a Transformer. And there is no one on the left who is more enjoyable to meltdown than what's left of Keith Olbermann. Once the paragon of progressive virtue signaling, he now rants in his kitchen and calls it a podcast.

Keithums wants Donald Trump put to death over. No, really. While the indictment made his nipples hard, Trump NOT being eligible for the death penalty is the one thing that is giving KO a sad.

\u201cUNFORTUNATELY IT\u2019S NOT A DEATH PENALTY CASE\n\nTrump indictment is breathtaking but even now we may not know all his national security crimes\n\nAnd we do NOT know if foreign powers stole what he stole\n\nSPECIAL NEW WEEKEND TRUMP INDICTMENT COUNTDOWN PODCAST: https://t.co/M9xt1fPsMi\u201d
— Keith Olbermann\u2199\ufe0f (@Keith Olbermann\u2199\ufe0f) 1686438008

A rational person can look at the charges one the metis and have differing opinions. It is like this on the right now. We all agree this is a politically motivated charge. From there, it's choosing your own legal analyst.

Pro-Trump impeachment witness Jonathan Turley says the evidence is quite strong, and while it's true the DOJ is put to get Trump, Trump made it easy for them. Some of the evidence is coming from his former counsel, and these are very damaging statements made against him. If you look at what is being described in this indictment ... he made it more easy for them to do so."

Mark Levin, conservative talks radio icon, disagrees a sees a broader issue at play: "There is no law. What’s going on here is a disgusting disgrace. It is war on Trump. It is war on the Republican Party. It is a war on the republic. The radical Left is doing what the radical Left does while they cover up for Biden, the way they covered up for Hillary."

That's how rational people disagree, Olbermann goes stampeding off to a firing squad based on the fantasy in his head of what Trump did. If when Trump told fans he was going to lock Hillary Clinton up when elected president -- which he then didn't do -- he never once said he was going to put her on death row. If anything Hillary would be hanging out with her gal pal Ghislaine Maxwell and playing softball.

Olbermann needs to go touch grass. And those glasses make him look like he's transitioning into that creepy old lady who lives on the corner no one likes.

>

<

title: Crowder Exclusive: Whistleblower leaks how NSA is promoting LGBTQ agenda to government employees
description:

\u201cWhite House During Easter\n\nWhite House Durung Veterans Day\n\nWhite House During Christmas\n\nWhite House During Pride Month\u201d
— Matt Wallace (@Matt Wallace) 1686450597

Pride is also infecting our intelligence agencies. We have exclusive info concerning the NSA and the LGBTQ+ Agenda. A whistleblower sent us this email of the NSA openly promoting the queer agenda to employees.

“To effectively accomplish our mission to defend our nation and protect our future, NSA relies on a workforce composed of a variety of backgrounds, including race, culture, ethnicity, gender, sexual orientation, age, and ability.”

“When our colleague Heidi started at NSA, she found a community she could connect with in our Pride ERG – and a place where she could make a difference.”

“She’s gone on to advocate for the LGBTQIA+ community at NSA by leading trainings on topics like allyship and intersectionality.”

title: White teacher tries comparing Armenian Genocide to defend trans agenda, one Armenian parent is NOT having it
description:
There is a part of me who thinks this could be satire because she is a little TOO on the nose as a wackadoodle liberal broad. But yes, a white woman -- I'm guessing named Karen -- wouldn't calm down at a school board meeting about how dare Armenians come to this country and not support trans people or something. At least one Armenian protestor is not happy.

These are the protests that took place in California, where Muslim and Christian students joined forces to speak out about what public schools wanted to indoctrinate kids with. Not to be confused with a similar protest in Maryland, where a Democrat called Muslim students "while supremacists" for disagreeing with her.

For reference:

  • Armenian Genocide: 1.5 million Armenians being murdered by Turks.
  • Trans Genocide: Two words used by leftists to delegitimize any opposing viewpoint about girls' sports and whether seven-year-olds can decide about having their ball cut off.

Now check out this lady:

\u201cA teacher in the Glendale School District in California, where the violent protests went on earlier between Antifa and Armenians over pride month, went on an absolutely batshit insane rant during the school board meeting:\n\n"I deal with a lot of the trauma of LGBT youth related to\u2026\u201d
— Greg Price (@Greg Price) 1686106112

The fact that she unironically worked "hetero-normative, Judeo-Christian, patriarchal, imperialist, capitalist" into her rant is why part of me thinks this is satire. However, this is also Califonia where the words "leave kids alone" is considered homophobic.

When she you people'd the Armenian parents protesting is where she really shined.

How dare you as marginalized people come here, and you don't want to talk about the oppressed trans youth … your kids are even learning what they need to learn in this that 1 in 2 will commit suicide and that 95% of kids will know they're trans when they are 3, 4, or 5 years old.

One of the Armenian parents protesting -- who disagrees that kids know they're trans when they are toddlers -- told Fox News this was beyond offensive.

A genocide of 1.5 million at least Armenians by the Turkish Ottoman Turks … it's complete gaslighting on the other side. All I have got to say is kids are not allowed to drink before 21. They're not allowed to have tattoos before 18. They're not allowed to buy guns before 18. And somehow, some way, they have enough common sense to be able to choose what gender they are like.

If find it doubtful this is the only Armenian who shares this sentiment. At least, until leftists change the definition of "genocide." We all know that's coming.

>

<

title: Democrat official call Muslims protesting school's "pride" curriculum white supremacists, but is super sorry about it
description:
A Democrat official accused Muslim students of being white supremacists for wanting to opt out of their school pushing gender and sexuality politics on them. Though she regrets saying so. For you see, she respects Muslims having their right to oppose her lGBTQAIIP+EIEIO agenda. But if Christians do it, there's something wrong with them.

For clarification, there were TWO majority protests where Christians and Muslims joined forces to speak out on behalf of their kids. One was in Glendale, California. That was the one that caused a Call of Duty creator to get canceled because he said "leave kids alone" and Activision finds those three words to be anti-gay.

This story takes place in Montgomery County Maryland. Where city councilwoman Kristen Mink had this to say to Muslim students who believed their first-grade and third-grade cousins shouldn't be exposed to Mink's sexual agenda. "This issue has, unfortunately, does put… some Muslim families on the same side of an issue as White supremacists and outright bigots," said Mink." I would not put you in the same category as those folks, although, you know, it’s complicated because they’re falling on the same side of this particular issue."

\u201cMontgomery County, Maryland Councilmember Kristin Mink tells the county public school board @MCPS that Muslim families who seek the right to opt out of teachings on sexual morality that violate their religion are on the same side as white supremacists\u201d
— Islam RFI (@Islam RFI) 1686091917
\u201cAn Arab parent, a West African imam, and an Ethiopian Orthodox Christian priest walk into a school board protest\u2026\n\nHere are some of Montgomery County councilmember Kristen Mink\u2019s \u201cwhite supremacists\u201d at today\u2019s rally\u201d
— Islam RFI (@Islam RFI) 1686091917

Redstate reports Mink's comments came after students had spoken out about being unable to opt out of a class that violates their religious beliefs.

Mink then apparently went on to explain that “equity” now trumps religious freedom guaranteed them in the Constitution saying, “That is equity. That’s not an infringement on, you know, particular religious freedoms, just as we cannot allow folks to opt out of teachings about evolution.”

Mink has since apologized.

\u201cOn Tues., June 6, I spoke at a Montgomery County Board of Education meeting about inclusive education & whether families should be permitted to opt their children out of LGBTQIA-inclusive curriculum materials. I regret that although my remarks were focused on promoting inclusion,\u201d
— Councilmember Kristin Mink (@Councilmember Kristin Mink) 1686509223

This is how Democrats think. Muslims, because Democrats put them on the preferred marginalized list, should drop their religious beliefs that Democrats claim to respect when those beliefs get in the way of Democrats exploiting others on the list to promote their agenda. After all, the real enemy is white Christians!

Muslims are still expected to check their religious liberty at the door when they to a government school, where the only accepted religion is whatever Democrats believe that week. But they are RESPECTFULLY expected to do. Christians and/or anyone who practices one of the Jesus-based religions can go f*ck themselves.

>

<

title: Actress lashes out at Ron DeSantis, accuses him of being in the KKK while the Tony Awards erupts in applause
description:
The Tony Awards were on CBS last night. I know, right? I missed them too. And I sure do like watching elitist celebrities give each other reacharounds while celebrating their own perceived awesomeness. This had all of that AND low-information, ignorant political statements. One actress accused Ron DeSantis of being in the KKK. Not only that but being the Grand Wizard!

I know that you know it's bullsh*t. But Hamilton actress Denee Benton thought she was being witty, and the other elitists in the audience loved it. They must have missed her flashing the double white power sign as she did it.

As the Anti-Defamation League tells us, when you throw up three fingers and make a circle with the other two, it CLEARLY makes a "W" and a "P" that stands for "white power." Don't look at me. I don't make the rules.

What did the Tony Awards say about Ron DeSantis?


Benton was presenting an award for "outstanding HS theatre teacher." The Florida native lashed out, "I am certain the current Grand Wizard -- I'm sorry...governor of my home state of Florida" will rename the town Plantation, Florida.

On the Tony Awards on CBS, actress Denee Benton announces award for outstanding HS theatre teacher. She wisecracked "I am certain the current Grand Wizard -- I'm sorry...governor of my home state of Florida" (wild screams, applause) will rename the town Plantation, Florida. pic.twitter.com/YsceE5B8QR
— Tim Graham (@TimJGraham) June 12, 2023

You would think someone who is starring in Hamilton would know a thing or two about white supremacy. Yet, here we are.

What makes Denee Banton think Ron DeSantis is KKK?


If I were to guess? Stupidity and laziness. Leftists have a habit of thinking any opposing viewpoint is raaaaaacist and DeSantis has had two major legislative wins that progressives won't calm down about.

The first is Florida's Parental Right in Education Act, which leftists lied about being the "Don't Say Gay Bill" knowing the media and entertainment industry would swear by it. At some point, the left has to take the "L" over this. They tried lying about the bill. It didn't work. The vast majority of Americans support the bill once they see what it ACTUALLY says, including a majority of Florida DEMOCRATS. As it turns out, a law preventing teachers' union thugs from promoting sex and gender to kids in 3rd grade and under is popular. Parents don't think it is appropriate for adults to push sex on five-year-olds.

You would assume a bill critics call "-phobic" wouldn't mean people being put on a plantation. But, you know. Intersectionality.

The other issue, and the one that caused the NAACP to declare Florida no longer safe for black people, is that DeSantis' BOE rejected a single AP African American History curriculum. Because while the state believes students should learn about:

Instructional personnel may facilitate discussions and use curricula to address, in an age-appropriate manner, how the individual freedoms of persons have been infringed by slavery, racial oppression, racial segregation, and racial discrimination, as well as topics relating to the enactment and enforcement of laws resulting in racial oppression, racial segregation, and racial discrimination and how recognition of these freedoms has overturned these unjust laws.

And that

Students shall develop an understanding of the ramifications of prejudice, racism, and stereotyping on individual freedoms, and examine what it means to be a responsible and respectful person, for the purpose of encouraging tolerance of diversity in a pluralistic society and for nurturing and protecting democratic values and institutions.

Who is f*cking who (aka, the "queer studies" the left tried sneaking in) was not appropriate.

We will see if the governor and presidential candidate (LET'S GO RON) comments on the actress's derptastic moment today. I'm sure he forgot the awards were on too.

>

<
